name: STUDIO 21
overview:
Studio 21 is an Indian Tech Startup founded in the year 2009 with the mission to build products and applications that make life easy and are just affordable.

A Miscrosoft BizSpark Startup, Studio 21, then crafted a wonderful cloud based e-Commerce product, Net My Store (www.netmystore.com), for the global e-tailers which enables them to start their own e-Commerce Shops online only for Rs. 499/- per month.

Inside the Studio 21 technology lab, we firmly believe in breaking the conventional shackles and do things differently. We nourish an idea and develop it to produce an innovative solution which would mesmerise the user with its simplicity in operation and still provide a robust & flexible architecture to handle all sorts of system complexities. All this, without buring a hole in the user’s pocket.

At Studio 21, nothing is accepted below excellence and this reflects in all that we do. We, at Studio 21, take up not-so-easy things to build apps that make life easy for the world.
